alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 10:10PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lauderdale, southeastern Colbert and northeastern Franklin Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1009 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tuscumbia, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Littleville, Underwood-Petersville, Posey Loop, Northwest Alabama Regional Airport, New Bethel and Barton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
